data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 2, Ceara's Cleber Bomfim is whistled for offside at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Pedro Naressi.
In the minute 4, Vinicius Lima instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 9, Leandro Castan's header is off-target for Vasco da Gama.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Ceara a goal kick.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 10, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Ceara drive forward but Vinicius Lima is judged offside.
In the minute 14, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Carlinhos (Vasco da Gama) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Ceara have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 16, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
In the minute 21, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 24, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Ceara needs to be cautious. Vasco da Gama have an attacking throw-in.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
It's now 0-2 in Rio de Janeiro as Cleber Bomfim scores for Ceara.
Bruno Pacheco with an assist there.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Ceara at São Januario.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Leonardo Gil for Vasco da Gama has been booked by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 30, The match at São Januario has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pedro Naressi, who is down injured.
Pedro Naressi for Ceara is back on the field again.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ribamar.
In the minute 32, Ribamar is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Pedro Naressi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 35, Pedro Naressi is back on his feet again.
Andrey gets his shot on target but fails to score for Vasco da Gama.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 36, Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 40, Cleber Bomfim for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Can Ceara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vasco da Gama's half?
Throw-in for Ceara close to the penalty box.
In the minute 44, Vasco da Gama's Andrey gets in a shot on goal at São Januario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ceara's Leo Chu has run offside.
In Rio de Janeiro Vasco da Gama attack through Carlinhos. The finish is off target, however.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second half has started at São Januario.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Ricardo Graca with Tiago Reis.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Ceara.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In the minute 49, Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Rio de Janeiro.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a throw-in for Vasco da Gama, close to Ceara's area.
In the minute 50, Ceara have a goal kick.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Ceara's half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 51, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo waits before resuming play because Vinicius Lima for Ceara is still down.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo blows against Vasco da Gama's Gustavo Torres for offside.
Ceara’s Vinicius Lima is on his feet again at São Januario.
In the minute 53, Ceara to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ceara will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 57, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Ceara push forward at São Januario and Leo Chu gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Vasco da Gama defence.
In the minute 59, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards the away team a throw-in.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Vasco da Gama are pushing forward but Leonardo Gil's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 63, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a penalty...
Ceara's Luiz Otavio has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
Goal! Vasco da Gama now trail just 1-2 thanks to a penalty from Ribamar.
In the minute 67, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Saulo is replacing Cleber Bomfim for Ceara at São Januario.
In the minute 69, Guto Ferreira is making the team's second substitution at São Januario with Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca replacing Leo Chu.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Sa Pinto (Vasco da Gama) is making a second substitution, with Martin Benitez replacing Leonardo Gil.
In the minute 70, The home team have replaced Leo Matos with Cayo Tenorio. This is the third substitution made today by Ricardo Sa Pinto.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 72, Ceara's Vinicius Lima gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 73, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Gustavo Torres (Vasco da Gama) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Ceara at São Januario.
In the minute 74, Ceara's Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca breaks free at São Januario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In the minute 75, Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Ceara a goal kick.
The away team have replaced Bruno Pacheco with Alyson. This is the third substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
Attention is being given to Ceara’s Richard and play has been suspended briefly.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 79, Goal! Saulo extends Ceara's lead to 1-3.
That's a fine assist from Vinicius Lima.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 82, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 84, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Ceara.
Ricardo Sa Pinto is making the team's fourth substitution at São Januario with Juninho replacing Carlinhos.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Ceara.
Andrey (Vasco da Gama) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Ceara have been given a penalty at São Januario...
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Ceara's half.
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
Ceara have a goal kick.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Ceara.
Martin Benitez of Vasco da Gama gets in a strike, but is off target.
Vinicius Goncalves Dias Araujo awards Ceara a goal kick.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 1-4.
Ceara are going well in Rio de Janeiro. They now lead 1-4 thanks to a Vinicius Goes penalty.
Ceara make their fourth substitution with Wescley replacing Vinicius Goes.
Victor Jacare is replacing Vinicius Lima for Ceara at São Januario.
Ygor Catatau is replacing Ribamar for the home team.
